channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- Secure Access Client Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- Secure Access Client Windows

item.title: CVE-2023-38043|2023-11-22T23:28:30.779Z -- ivanti -- secure%20access%20client%20windows
item.description: A vulnerability exists on all versions of the Ivanti Secure Access Client below 22.6R1.1, which could allow a locally authenticated attacker to exploit a vulnerable configuration, potentially leading to a denial of service (DoS) condition on the user machine and, in some cases, resulting in a full compromise of the system.

item.title: CVE-2023-38543|2023-11-22T23:28:30.776Z -- ivanti -- secure%20access%20client%20windows
item.description: A vulnerability exists on all versions of the Ivanti Secure Access Client below 22.6R1.1, which could allow a locally authenticated attacker to exploit a vulnerable configuration, potentially leading to a denial of service (DoS) condition on the user machine.
